caption.p: SRB assay on HEK293 cells to evaluate the effect of the four plant extracts: ( A) XA, ( B) IC, ( C) EG and ( D) DP on the cell growth after 48 h (X-axis: log concentrations of extracts from 1 to 200 (µg/mL) and Y-axis: the percentage of normalized absorbance). Values are mean ± SD of three independent experiments.
